designRef: Designed on the fly from my mind and taking as reference <anchorRefPortfolio>Brittany Chiang's portfolio</anchorRefPortfolio> and <anchorRefAngular>angular.dev's site</anchorRefAngular>.
builtWithRef: Built with <anchorNextJS>Next.js</anchorNextJS> and <anchorTailwindCSS>Tailwind CSS</anchorTailwindCSS>, deployed with <anchorVercel>Vercel</anchorVercel> and programmed in <anchorVSCode>VS Code</anchorVSCode>.
